messages.message:
Convert between radiation related units.
Ex: 5 MBq, 2 nCi, 1.2rad, 15E-3gy, 0.2mrem, 8feet, 9milli-sievert, 10 gram U235, 1.2 uCi Pu238
Current state of the unit converter tool.

Error: {1}.
Allowed activity units: bq, becquerel, ci, curie, gray, Gy, rad, sievert, Sv, rem, roentgen, m, meter, ft, inch, in, gram, g, ounce, oz, pound, lb, and grain.
Allowed (optional) prefixes: n, nano, u, Âµ, micro, m, milli, k, killo, M, mega, G, Giga, T, and Tera
